title: Maggie L Walker National Historic Site: Safety
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Safety            Safety       For a safe and enjoyable park visit please practice these safety tips:  Park carefully along the city streets surrounding the site. Secure your vehicle and personal belongings. Use crosswalks at intersections. Solicitation (panhandling) is not permitted. Firearms are prohibited in park buildings. Report unsafe or suspicious activity to a park ranger or call 911.
